question: You have recently purchased a gift item for one of your friends.  Write a letter to this friend. In your letter,  tell him/her about the gift tell how you want to sent the gift to this friend explain why you chose this gift for your friend
text: Hope you are in good health and spirit. I felt very happy to receive your letter last week. Anyway, you will be glad to know that I have bought a nice gift, actually, a wristwatch for you when I went to visit Switzerland about a couple of weeks ago.

I know how you have always loved to wear a wristwatch, especially one from Europe. Hence I bought you one, which is gorgeous and classy in my view. Packed in a beautiful platinum case, this watch has a shiny, dark silver coloured strap. Besides, its crystal perfectly matches its hour markers inside which illuminate nicely in the dark. It is manufactured by "Tissot", a renowned watch brand in Switzerland.

I chose this gift because not only will it look good on you, but also because the finish won't fade quickly due to excessive sweating, especially, when I know how profusely you sweat during the summer. I also thought it would be a good gift from my tour for you.

Mailing it through a courier service would be the best bet in my opinion as it will be delivered to you speedily - in the next couple of days. Please let me know whether I should courier it to your home or office address.
